channel.title: Jim's Docs
channel.description: Jim's Docs houses various technical documentation related to R meant to be shared.
channel.item: Dealing with Images in R Jimmy Briggs <<<<<<< Updated upstream https://jimsdocs.jimbrig.com/posts/2021-12-18-dealing-with-images-in-r A walkthrough of dealing with images in R and creating a custom image gallery. https://jimsdocs.jimbrig.com/posts/2021-12-18-dealing-with-images-in-r ======= https://jimsdocs.jimbrig.com/posts/2021-12-18-1-dealing-with-images-in-r A walkthrough of dealing with images in R and creating a custom image gallery. https://jimsdocs.jimbrig.com/posts/2021-12-18-1-dealing-with-images-in-r Sat, 18 Dec 2021 00:00:00 +0000

R Package Developer Essentials Jimmy Briggs https://jimsdocs.jimbrig.com/posts/2021-12-18-2-r-package-developer-essentials A walkthrough of the various packages, tools, resources, and axioms I have encountered over my years as an R package sofware engineer. https://jimsdocs.jimbrig.com/posts/2021-12-18-2-r-package-developer-essentials >>>>>>> Stashed changes Sat, 18 Dec 2021 00:00:00 +0000

item.title: Experimenting with Caching Backends in R
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: Take a look at some of the more advanced, modern ways of utilizing backend caching with hosted applications or workflows.

item.title: Searching from R
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Briggs
item.description: 'Utilize advanced searching techniques to quickly launch a search from R'

item.title: Welcome to Jim's Docs
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, Jim's Docs. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!
